title: Initial steps of investigating infectious disease

content.question: When scientists discover the existence of an emerging infectious disease such as SARS (severe acute respiratory syndrome), they must take immediate steps to determine the cause of the disease and the method of transmission. These initial steps would include which of the following?

choices.label: Developing a vaccine to eliminate the disease
Beginning a program to eradicate insect vectors for the disease
Acquiring recent medical and travel histories of the disease victims
Testing methods to block airborne transmission of the disease
Estimating the cost of eradicating the disease

content.answer: Acquiring recent medical and travel histories of the disease victims
